question: The idea of having a single career is becoming an old fashioned one. The new fashion mil be to have several careers or ways of earning money and further education will be something that continues throughout life.
text: It is believed focusing on a single career is out of date. These days, the trend is toward having several occupations that can make a living from it and also, continuous education till the end. This essay will consider the benefits that several occupations bring.
